title: Wura(tv series)
overview: Tv series Wura is about is a ruthless gold-mining magnate and CEO of Frontline Gold Mine in Iperindo community. She is a faultless and a saint in her family but when it comes to running her business, she becomes that ruthless lady, who doesn't care whose ox is gored in her path to get what she wants.

casts.name: Scarlet Gomez,Yomi Fash Lanso,Carol King,Ray Adeka,Iremide Adeoye,Ego Iheanacho,Martha Ehinome,Lanre Adediwura

directors: Dimeji Ajibola, Adeola Osunkojo,Yemi Morafa, Ben Chiadika, Philemon Maigari
writers: Musa Jeffery David, Olumide Kuti, Isaac Ayodeji, Esther Kokori, Lois Truly, Uchenna
